Aluminium Window Repairs

Single and double-glazed aluminium window repairs: stays, hinges, handles, latches, draft and rattle fixes across Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Common parts we replace

Where we work

Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Related: Awning stays & hinges • Draught & leak repairs

Window repair FAQs

  • Do you repair single and double glazed aluminium windows?
    Yes. We work on both single- and double-glazed aluminium windows, including stays, hinges, seals and alignment.
  • Do you replace stays and hinges in coastal areas?
    Yes. We carry corrosion-resistant hardware and fit stays/hinges suited to Wellington and Porirua coastal conditions.
  • Can you fix drafts in older aluminium windows?
    We replace wedges/seals, service latches and re-align sashes to stop rattles and drafts.
